DOC.detailed_description: Albumin-bound paclitaxel plus carboplatin regimen advance NSCLC especially lung squamous cell carcinoma well tumor response rate safety , therefore , program apply neoadjuvant therapy , may obtain good tumor pathological remission rate , improve operation resection rate , thus improve prognosis.The main purpose study observe safety efficacy albumin-bound paclitaxel / carboplatin treatment lung squamous cell carcinoma stage IIB IIIA .
DOC.criteria: 1.Histological cytological diagnosis lung squamous cell carcinoma stage IIB IIIA . 2.18 year old 3.ECOG Performance Status 2 ; 4.Appraisable disease , presence least three lesion longest diameter < 10 mm brain MRI ; 5.Haemoglobin 10.0 g/dl , Absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) 1.5 x 10E9/L , platelet 100 x 10E9/L ; 6.Total bilirubin 1.5 x upper limit normal ( ULN ) ; 7.ALT AST < 2.5 x ULN absence liver metastasis , < 5 x ULN case liver metastasis ; 8.Creatinine clearance 60ml/min ( calculate accord Cockcroftgault formula ) . 1 . Any systemic anticancer treatment NSCLC 2 . Local radiotherapy NSCLC . 3 . In study within five year prior start treatment NSCLC patient cancer . 4 . Any instability systemic disease , include : active infection , absence control hypertension , unstable angina , begin last 3 month angina pectoris , congestive heart failure 5 . HIV infection ; 6 . Allergic paclitaxel Platinum ; 7. mixed adenocarcinoma , small cell lung cancer ; 8 . Pregnant lactating woman ; 9 . Other researcher believe fit group
